Ice cream (base)
10 min preparation, 6 hours in the freezer
4-8
https://sk.pinterest.com/pin/310959549271721624/

1 can condensed milk (~400g)
2 cans/cups whipping cream (~400-500ml)
Toppings (chocolate, biscuits, fruit, etc.)

Mix desired topping with condensed milk. Whip the cream and gently fold in. Decorate and freeze at least for 6 hours. 
The batter can be divided into several bowls to make more kinds icecream.
